content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to the latest information on credit cards and their income requirements. It would be best to check directly with the credit card companies' websites or customer service representatives to see which cards have the lowest income requirements. You can also try using financial comparison websites or credit card eligibility checkers to compare different credit cards and their eligibility requirements. However, keep in mind that meeting the income requirement is just one of the factors considered by credit card companies when assessing eligibility, so there may be other criteria that you need to meet to get approved for a card.
